mapper.select:
select attribute.id, entity_id, attribute.name, display_name, attribute.desc, data_type, data_type_length, data_type_format_id, display_width, form_promp_content, sort_wieght, enable_attribute_log, enable_readonly, enable_required, mdm_type, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from tb_attribute as attribute where attribute.del_flag=1
and attribute.name like concat('%', #{query.keyword}, '%')
